basics.name: Liam Schenk
basics.summary: Hi, I’m Liam, a mediamatics specialist apprentice at Swisscom. I’m passionate about graphic and web design, with a focus on keeping things simple and well-organized. I love learning new things, and in my free time, you’ll likely find me tinkering with projects or exploring my ever-growing Spotify playlist.

work.name: Swisscom
work.summary: During my apprenticeship as a mediamatics specialist, I have worked in various departments at Swisscom and gained experience in all areas of multimedia.

volunteer.summary: In August 2023, I assisted with both First Steps at Swisscom, where I introduced new apprentices to the company and provided them with important information and useful tips.
At Motion, we conducted and recorded an interview with Heinz Frei in collaboration with Pascal Schwendimann. We also hosted a livestream for the event.

projects.name: Digital Chalkboard Guidelines
projects.description: For my IPA at Swisscom, I created a design manual and template for digital chalkboards to ensure consistent visual output and simplify the creation process for future trainees.

projects.name: Point of Sales — Print Media
projects.description: At POS, I lead the decoration tour process within a team and manage the corresponding blog for Swisscom shops. In addition, I occasionally designed print media. Below is a selection of my work in this area.

projects.name: Point of Sales — Animation
projects.description: For the Glücksmaschine, I developed an animation and screensaver. Customers could participate by scanning a QR code in the shop for a chance to win prizes.
